subject: Law
title: The Fourteenth Amendment: Equal Protection
description: One-minute skill: The Fourteenth Amendment: Equal Protection.

hook.text: One amendment gets cited in more Supreme Court cases than any other. It's the Fourteenth‚Äîand it reshaped America.

buildup.text: Ratified in 1868, it grants citizenship to all born in the US and guarantees equal protection and due process.

discovery.text: The Equal Protection Clause became the basis for desegregation, voting rights, and marriage equality rulings.

twist.text: For decades after ratification, courts interpreted it narrowly, allowing Jim Crow laws to flourish.

climax.text: It took nearly a century for the amendment's promise to be enforced as its authors intended.

punchline.text: Equal protection was ratified in 1868. It's still being realized.

quiz.question: What does the Fourteenth Amendment's Equal Protection Clause guarantee?
